sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, the silence had been broken in the small drawingroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 那边小客厅内, 此时亦不寂寞.

sentence.Network_en: They therefore went into the drawingroom in good humour with each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们于是彼此融融洽洽地走进客厅里去.

sentence.Network_en: The ladies retired to the drawingroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 女士们离开餐室到客厅去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: drawingrollers 牵伸罗拉, drawingroom 制图室, drawingroom 会客室

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
